publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2860 Tommy Sheridan: Henry McLeish's Constituency Office—That the Parliament notes with concern the press reports on the latest revelations concerning Henry McLeish’s constituency office; calls for a full publication by Fife Council of their report and for an independent inquiry into this scandal; further calls for the resignation of Henry McLeish as an MSP while he draws a high pension of £34,000 a year for 13 months’ work as First Minister, and calls for an investigation into the awarding of this pension while hundreds of thousands of pensioners barely survive on less than £10,000 per year after a lifetime of work.
